typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sepallength as double,
		sepalwidth as double,
		petallength as double,
		petalwidth as double,
		class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	batchSize: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(avgsepallength = avg(sepallength),
		avgsepalwidth = avg(sepalwidth),
		avgpetallength = avg(petallength),
		avgpetalwidth = avg(petalwidth)) ~> Aggregate1
source1, Aggregate1 join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 split(sepallength > avgsepallength,
	sepalwidth > avgsepalwidth,
	petallength > avgpetallength,
	petalwidth > avgpetalwidth,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(AboveAvgLongSepals, AboveAvgWideSepals, AboveAvgLongPetals, AboveAvgWidePetals, BelowAverage)
ConditionalSplit1@AboveAvgLongSepals sink(input(
		sepallength as string,
		sepalwidth as string,
		petallength as string,
		petalwidth as string,
		class as string,
		avgsepallength as string,
		avgsepalwidth as string,
		avgpetallength as string,
		avgpetalwidth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AboveAvgSepals.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AboveAvgSepals
ConditionalSplit1@AboveAvgWideSepals sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AboveAvgPetalLength.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AboveAverageSepalWidth
ConditionalSplit1@AboveAvgLongPetals sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AboveAvgPetalLength'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AboveAvgPetalLength
ConditionalSplit1@AboveAvgWidePetals sink(input(
		sepallength as string,
		sepalwidth as string,
		petallength as string,
		petalwidth as string,
		class as string,
		avgsepallength as string,
		avgsepalwidth as string,
		avgpetallength as string,
		avgpetalwidth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AboveAvgPetalWidth'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AboveAvgPetalWidth
